notes.text: For GenericTile, we've now updated the badge element name to Tileinfo, and also created a new enum TileInfoColor that adds color to the TileInfo element
sap.m.Input: Exception prevented in case of tabular suggestions
sap.m.Dialog: The toolbar spacer is no longer hidden on phone
We now support snapToRow property that sets the height of the inner controls to 100%
We've now introduced the badge element that is used within the GenericTile control as a combination of an icon and a text
sap.m.Input: Available items announcement improved
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
sap.m.Input: Prevent suggestions popover closing on Enter key
sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
GenericTile: Remove the critical color on the text when the tile is in ActionMode
sap.m.MaskInput: remove too descriptive label
sap.m.MessageBox: Add new dependentOn option
sap.m.IconTabBar: Badge is visible on tab with text and icon - inline mode
sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Prevent infinite resize
sap.m.Toolbar: Title font-size fixed
sap.m.Toolbar: Fix left aligment in Tables
sap.m.Slider: Accessibility samples adjusments
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is displayed correctly in Form
sap.m.Avatar: Fix image loading of Avatar
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix footer buttons visibility when there is not enough space
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix closing Popover with ComboBox
sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
sap.m.TimePickerClock: fixed time selection when the page is scrolled
We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
sap.m.MultiInput: Do not delete tokens on RIGHT arrow navigation
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix popup rendering
sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The cellPress event is fired correctly
sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Implement onfocusfail logic"
We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
